message:
Infects enemies with a disease to confuse them and deal more Physical and Magic Damage to them. Confused enemies will attack their allies.
#yDark Magic
Magic Damage: {0}% + {1}
Physical and Magic Damage +{2}%
Duration: {3} sec
+1 Alchemy Bubble upon using the skill
Increases Injection's range and damage. Adds a final damage effect to the first ally to hit.\n#yInjection Damage +{0}%\nFinal Damage +{1}%

Heals nearby allies and temporarily boosts all damage they deal.
#yHealing: {0}% + {1} of Magic Damage
All Damage +{3}% for {2} sec
Removes up to 3 status effects
Obtain 1 Alchemy Bubble upon using the skill

Throws up to 4 flasks and deals more damage to the target. Spread a stronger poison to infect enemies with a disease.
#yContagion Damage +{0}%
Damage Dealt to Enemies +{1}%
Duration: {2} sec
Additional Poison Pop, Toxic Spill, and Toxic Surge Damage to Infected Enemies: {3}%
Plague Damage +{4}
Enhances Toxic Swirl to deal additional damage. Press the regular attack button to activate. Roto-whirl can be used even after the extra attack.\n#yAdditional Hit Damage: {0}% of Toxic Twirl damage

Enhances Toxic Spill. Perform an additional hit by pressing the regular attack button or recover in a wide range by pressing the special attack button. The additional hit deals damage without poison and is not affected by the bubble.\n#yAdditional Hit Damage: {0}% of Toxic Spill damage\nAmount Recovered in Wide Range: {1}% of Toxic Spill damage

After gaining an Alchemy Bubble from poison or healing skills, increases Magic Damage for #y{0} sec#w.
#yMagic Damage +{1}%
Dark Attack +{2}%
When hitting the target with Injection, Injection Cooldown: -{3} sec
Creates {4} more Bubbles when more Injection is used.
Enhances Good Vibrations. Creates a healing aura that cures all harmful effects every {0} seconds and recovers HP by #y{1}%#w.
